mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComDmstcDlvCstPlcExcp Generator(Generator) 2018-05-29 */ DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , EXCP_TURN , EXCP_POST_NO , EXCP_BASE_ADDR , EXCP_DMSTC_DLV_CST , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC_EXCP WHERE 1 = 1 AND DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC_SN = #{dmstcDlvCstPlcSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND EXCP_TURN = #{excpTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
